rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text
Use semantic HTML (nav, main, section, article)
All images must have alt text
Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2)
Do not rely on color alone for status

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no default blue gradients.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a tech/premium feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Primary Action Color is #0F172A (Navy) or #2563EB (Electric Blue) depending on context.
Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) to create a premium 'airy' feel.
Glassmorphism should be subtle (white/70), not muddy gray.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
For the Customizer: Prioritize screen real estate for the canvas. Controls should be collapsible or neatly organized in a sidebar.
Mobile First: Ensure the customizer works on touch screens (pinch to zoom, drag to move).

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react sonner clsx tailwind-merge` (or yarn add).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Setup Tailwind theme colors in `tailwind.config.js` to match the palette.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the Layout component with a sticky glassmorphism header.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'Hero' section using the provided image and gradient text.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the 'Product Grid' using the Bento Grid system.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Develop the 'Logo Customizer' using HTML5 Canvas or a library like `react-konva` (if allowed) or raw DOM manipulation.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_7: Ensure all forms (Contact, Checkout) use Shadcn-styled inputs.
